13887.<pc>の 持っている\n『超天遊戯－死の書－』が 光り始めた！:
The Choten Yugi: Book Four in <pc>'s
possession has begun to glow!

13888.白紙だったページに 文字が浮かびあがってくる。\n<pc>とヤーンは その文字を:
Text emerges from the blank page.
<pc>, Yarn read.

13889.修行も今回で 最後になるからの……。\nこれで終わりでは ないぞ。:
This will be the last time I train, and it
won't be the last.

13890.ガタラ原野のどこかにある グルグ地下道。\nその奥の部屋の床に 魔獣の左角と\n:
Somewhere in the Gatara Fields is the Gulug
Underpass. Stick Beast's Left Horn and Beast's
Right Horn on the floor of the back room.

13891.そこで おぬしは 命をかけることになる。\n不退転の決意で この修行を果たせ。\:
There, you will put your life on the line. Fulfill this training with determination. I will not allow you to throw it away in the
process.

13892.「いよいよ 来たな～。\n ドワーフの国の ガタラ原野にある洞くつが\n 最後の:
It's finally here! It seems that the cave in
the Gatara Fields in the Land of Dwarves will
be the stage of the final training.

13893.「そんじゃ～ はりきって\n 修行を 果たしにいくとしようか～。\n もちろん:
Well then~ let's go and fulfill our training!
Of course, I'll come along too!

13894.「命をかけろって 言ってるくらいだからな～。\n 何が起こるか わからねえぜ？\:
I'm just saying, "Put your life on the line.
You never know what might happen. Make sure
you're prepared~.

13895.「安心しろって～！！ なんたって\n 今回は このオレが ついてるからな～！:
Don't worry~! After all, I'm with you this
time~!

13932.「ここの床に 魔獣の左角と 魔獣の右角を\n 突きたてれば いいんだな～。:
I guess we just have to stick Beast's Left
Horn and Beast's Right Horn in the floor here.

13933.「何が起こるか お楽しみだな。\n よし <cs_pchero> 始めるか～？<:
Let's see what happens. Okay <cs_pchero>
let's get started~?<yesno><close>

13934.「おいおい。ビビッたのか？\n オレが ついてるって言っただろ。\n いいから:
Oh, come on. You scared? I told you I have
your back. Just get on with it and do it!<yesno><close>

13935.<cs_pchero>は 魔獣の左角と 魔獣の右角を\nふたつとも 床に突きたて:
<cs_pchero> both the Beast's Left Horn and
the Beast's Right Horn against the floor...

13937.「出やがった 出やがった～！\n コイツを倒せってことのようだぜ。:
It's out, it's out, it's out! Looks like we're
supposed to take this guy down.

13938.「お～っと。アンタが倒さないと\n 修行失敗ってことも ありえるな～。:
Oops. If you don't beat him, it's possible
that your training will fail.

13939.「お手並み拝見と いかせてもらうぜ。\n がんばってくれよ <cs_pchero:
Let's see how you do. Good luck
<cs_pchero>~!

13941.「<cs_pchero> 今度はイケるよな？\n アイツは ヤル気マンマンみたい:
<cs_pchero> You think he's gonna make it
this time? He looks like he's ready to get
laid.

13943.「やるじゃねえか～。ここまでの修行を\n こなしてきたチカラは ダテじゃね～な。:
You're good, aren't you? You're not so bad
after all the training you've been through.

13944.「これで 超天道士の名は\n アンタに継がれた……のか？\n 死ぬ心配は なくな:
Now you've inherited the name of
"supernaturalist"? You should no longer be
worried about dying, right?

13945.「おいおい <cs_pchero>。\n アンタ 手を抜いたんじゃね～だろうな？:
Hey, hey <cs_pchero>. You didn't cut any
corners, did you?

13946.「あ～あ。結局 オレが やっちまったか。\n <cs_pchero> 平気か～？:
Ah~ ah. I guess I did it after all.
<cs_pchero> Are you okay? You're not going
to die, are you?

13949.「コイツは 不死身の魔物なのか！\n だとしたら コレは……マジでヤバいか？:
Is he an immortal monster? If so, is this a
serious problem?

13950.「その魔物は 強烈なショック状態に\n おとさないかぎり 倒すことはできないと\:
I've heard from a supernaturalist that this
monster can only be defeated by putting it
into a state of intense shock.

13952.「なんとかしないと <cs_pchero>殿は\n 本当に 死んでしまうかもしれ:
If we don't do something about it,
<cs_pchero> may indeed be dead.

13953.「ガウラド～。お前 あの技がなきゃ\n コイツを倒せないのを 知ってたんだな。\:
Gaurad~! You knew you couldn't beat him
without that technique, didn't you? Did your
grandfather put you up to this?

13954.「はあ～。あの技は使いたくないのによ……。\n なによりも じ～さんの思うツボっ:
I don't want to use that technique... I don't want to use that technique, but... I don't like the fact that I'm doing what Mr. Pot
wants me to do, but I can't help it~.

13955.「それなら 食らえよ！\n 超天道士直伝の必殺技！！:
Then eat it! The special move of the
Chotenkyoji direct!

13957.<cs_pchero>の 持っている\n『超天遊戯－死の書－』が 光り始めた！:
The Choten Yugi: Book Four in <cs_pchero>'s
possession has begun to glow!

13958.「……よくぞ 最後の修行を果たした。\n ワシが残せるものは これで すべてじゃ:
Well done on your final training. This is all
I have to leave you.

13959.「超天道士の名は おぬしが受け継ぐがいい。\n その技と心 そして教えと共に。:
You will inherit the name of Chotendo-sensei.
With your skills, your heart, and your
teachings.

13960.「新たな超天道士の誕生と 新たな伝説の始まりを\n ワシは あの世から見守るとし:
I will watch the birth of a new supernatural being and the beginning of a new legend from the other world...? You knew you were going to
die, didn't you?

13962.「これで あなたは\n 名実ともに 超天道士の名を\n その身に 受け継いだので:
You have now inherited the name of Chotendo-
sensei, both in name and in reality!

13963.「お前 もしかして オレをハメたのか？\n <cs_pchero>が死ぬって話も:
Did you set me up, by any chance? <You weren't
lying about the death of <cs_pchero>, were
you?

13964.「人聞きが悪いですよ ヤーン様。\n 武闘家たる者 死の危険は\n いつ いかな:
You are not a man of your word, Master Yarn.
As a martial artist, death is always at hand.

13965.「やっちまったものは しかたないな……。\n 超天道士の名。もらうだけ もらっと:
I can't help what I've done... the name of
Chotendo-sensei. I'll take it as long as I can
get it.

13966.「<cs_pchero>に 超天道士の名を\n 継いでもらおうって オレの作戦は:
My plan to have <cs_pchero> take over the
name of the Chosen One has failed. The Book of
Death will be returned as it is.

13967.<cs_pchero>は ヤーンに\n超天遊戯－死の書－を 返した。:
<cs_pchero> returned the Choten Yugi: Book
Four to Yarn.

13968.「オレのわがままで アンタを\n つきあわせちまって 悪かったな～。:
I'm sorry I put you in this situation because
of my own selfishness.

13969.「おわびと言っちゃ～アレだが\n さっきの技を アンタにも 教えてやるよ。\n:
I'm going to teach you the same thing I just
taught you. It's called Roaring Tirade.

13971.「たいしたものじゃないが コレを\n アンタに 贈らせてもらおう。: It's not much, but I'll give you this.

13972.「なあ～ 今度 オレと勝負してくれよ。\n アンタとだったら きっと\n いい闘:
Hey~ You should fight me sometime. I'm sure I
can have a good fight with you.

13973.「オレも 準備に取りかかるからさ～。\n 武闘家になって また オレんとこへ来て:
I'm going to start preparing too. Come back to
me again after you become a martial artist.
See you later <cs_pchero>~.

13974.「ついに超天道士の復活が なされた！\n どれだけ この時を待ったのか……。:
At long last, the Chotendoji has been
resurrected! How long I've waited for this
moment...
